sense.def:
A fact
je resnična trditev ali podatek.

seg.quote: The report is full of facts and figures.
He told me a few facts about her.

sense.def:
Besedo
fact
uporabimo tudi, kadar govorimo o obstoječem položaju ali o nečem, kar se je zgodilo.

seg.quote: ...the fact of belonging to a certain race.
...to investigate the facts of the killing.

sense.def:
Kadar je zgodba ali trditev
fact
, je resnična.

seg.quote: How much of the novel is fiction and how much is fact?

sense.def:
Z izrazi
in fact
,
in point of fact
,
in actual fact
, ali
as a matter of fact
poudarimo, da se je nekaj v resnici zgodilo ali je resnično, ali pa predstavimo neki podatek, zlasti če je natančnejši.

cit.quote: dejansko, po pravici povedano, pravzaprav, v resnici

seg.quote: This is, in fact, what happened.
In actual fact, we don't have all that much more leisure time than we used to.
It was terribly cold weather—a blizzard in fact.
As a matter of fact, I just got it this afternoon.
